title: Pancake with vega curry
directions: Prepare the pancake mix according to the instructions on the package with the milk and 4 eggs until smooth. Cook the rest of the eggs hard.
Heat a dash of baking product and fry the onion, bell pepper, cauliflower, zucchini and peas for about 4 minutes. Spoon the curry paste to taste and simmer for another 2-3 minutes.
Place wedges of hard-boiled egg on them. Heat a little baking product in a frying pan and fry pancakes from the batter. Serve the curry with the pancakes.
